revisionDesc.change: checked; moved notes to external file and added ptrs
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Moved RMBucke to HandNote; fixed editor, date, and title; reviewed paragraphing
Replaced smart quotes with straight; removed external URL links; added Bucke
Proofreading corrections and move postscript to postscript position with accompanying notes.
correct spacing, regularize spelling of bye

body.p:
the post man has gone bye by and no letters, and its being thursday Thursday i feel worried very much for fear it is gone as i dident didn't get it yesterday my usuall usual day i thought i would get it to day today i wanted very much to hear from you and likewise i was very short of money but if you have sent it it is taken sure i think of every thing that is unlikely to happen O walt if you are sick or any thing
the matter i hope you will let me know immedtely immediately as i shall be very uneasy till i hear i wrote A letter last week to you walter i suppose you got it it is too bad if the letter is gone i have been waching waching the letter man and he s he's past and no letter i feel real bad my lameness is not much better yet i am taking medicine from a doctor a very good one i think the one matty had for sis he has great practice and has a very good name he said if this dident didn't help me he dident didn't know as any thing would but he thought this would

postscript.p: matt dont don't hear from Jeff very often they are here yet
